traits.locale_text: All Navigator powers gain +(Navigator's PER / 2)% to critical hit chance. Held in My Gaze: The Navigator deals ((from 1 to 6) + 2 × WP bonus) damage to an enemy. That enemy must pass a Willpower resistance test or become immobilised until the start of the Navigator's next turn.

All Navigator powers gain +(Navigator's PER / 2)% critical hit chance. Held in My Gaze: the Navigator deals ((from 1 to 6) + 2 × WP bonus) damage to an enemy. That enemy must pass a Willpower resistance test or become immobilised until the start of the Navigator's next turn.

languages.original_text: All Navigator powers gain +{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todos los poderes de navegante ganan un +{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g}. Atrapado por mi mirada: El navegante inflige {uip|MinDamage|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}-{uip|MaxDamage|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo. Ese enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante.
Todos los poderes de navegante ganan un +{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g}.

languages.text: 导航者的所有能力获得+{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}。
languages.original_text: All Navigator powers gain +{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 导航者的所有能力获得+（导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}/2）%暴击率。{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}{/g} 定身凝视：导航者对一名敌人造成（（1到6）+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）点伤害。目标敌人需要进行意志抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，若检定失败会被{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}，直到导航者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始才会解除。
导航者的所有能力获得+{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}。

languages.original_text: All Navigator powers gain +{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Alle Navigator-Kräfte erlangen +{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868} % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g}. In meinem Blick gefangen: Der Navigator fügt einem Feind {uip|MinDamage|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}-{uip|MaxDamage|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu. Dieser Feind muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen, sonst wird er bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.

languages.text: Tous les pouvoirs de Navigator bénéficient de +{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868} % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup critique{/g}.
languages.original_text: All Navigator powers gain +{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tous les pouvoirs du Navigateur obtiennent +({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} du Navigateur / 2) % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique. Dans Mon Regard : le Navigateur inflige ((1 à 6) + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g}) points de dégâts à un ennemi. Cet ennemi doit se soumettre à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la Volonté, à défaut de quoi il sera {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisé{/g} jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Navigateur.
Tous les pouvoirs du Navigateur bénéficient de +{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup critique{/g}.

languages.text: すべての航宙士の力は{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}が+{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}%増加する。
languages.original_text: All Navigator powers gain +{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: すべての航宙士の力はクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}が+(航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} / 2)%増加する。 我が眼差しのもとへ：航宙士は、敵に((1～6) + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})のダメージを与える。その敵は意志力の抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しなければならず、失敗した場合は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。
すべての航宙士の力は{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}が+{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}%増加する。

traits.locale_text: Все силы навигатора получают +({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора / 2)% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического попадания{/g}. Выдержать взгляд: навигатор наносит ((от 1 до 6) + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g}) урона противнику. Этот противник должен пройти проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала он становится {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора.

Этот противник должен пройти проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала он становится {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора.
Все силы навигатора получают +{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g}.
